moves.1. e4: from a game i managed to win
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Bc5 4. a3 Nf6: it was an opening i never played before
moves.5. b4: i decided to threaten his bishop
moves.5... Bd6 6. Nc3: now i was controling the centre a lot more
moves.6... Nd4 7. Ng5: i was surprise he fell for it
moves.8. Nxf7: i took it as i knew i would the next move as he'll threaten it
moves.8... Rxf7 9. Bxf7+ Kxf7 10. d3 Kg8 11. O: decided i should control the biggest diagonal
after a swap of pawns and knights i threatened his queen
moves.15... Qc6 16. Qh5: then i thought i could get a free pawn
moves.17. b5: so i threatened his queen again
moves.17... Qc5: he moved it to a bad place
moves.18. Bxd4: he fell for my trap as he had a choice of either losing his queen, knight or the game
